document.full_text: russia is looking to the experience of other countries, including china, to "regulate" internet use, though moscow has no plans to broaden web censorship, a government spokesman said on saturday.
document.title: russia looks abroad for web laws, including to china
lines_and_colors: russia is looking to the experience of other countries, including china, to "regulate" internet use, though moscow has no plans to broaden web censorship, a government spokesman said on saturday.
